TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyResolver extends System.Object implements class Azure.Core.Cryptography.IKeyEncryptionKeyResolver

Docs.summary: Azure Key Vault KeyResolver. This class resolves Key Vault Key Identifiers and Secret Identifiers to create instances capable of performing cryptographic operations with the key. Secret Identifiers can only be resolved if the Secret is a byte array with a length matching one of the AES key lengths (128, 192, 256) and the content-type of the secret is application/octet-stream.
